solution_line_template: If {vanilla_percent*100}% of {total_customers} customers ordered vanilla, then there were {vanilla_percent}*{total_customers}=<<{vanilla_percent}*{total_customers}={vanilla_customers}>>{vanilla_customers} customers who ordered vanilla.
If there were twice as many people who ordered vanilla as chocolate, then {vanilla_customers}/2=<<{vanilla_customers}/2={chocolate_customers}>>{chocolate_customers} customers ordered chocolate.
